name: Convert to File
semantic_context: Convert JSON data to binary data
natural_language_description: 这是 Convert to File 节点。主要用于: Convert JSON data to binary data

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: csv
available_options: Convert to CSV (值: csv) - Transform input data into a CSV file
Convert to HTML (值: html) - Transform input data into a table in an HTML file
Convert to ICS (值: iCal) - Converts each input item to an ICS event file
Convert to JSON (值: toJson) - Transform input data into a single or multiple JSON files
Convert to ODS (值: ods) - Transform input data into an ODS file
Convert to RTF (值: rtf) - Transform input data into a table in an RTF file
Convert to Text File (值: toText) - Transform input data string into a file
Convert to XLS (值: xls) - Transform input data into an Excel file
Convert to XLSX (值: xlsx) - Transform input data into an Excel file
Move Base64 String to File (值: toBinary) - Convert a base64-encoded string into its original file format

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: The field that your iCalendar file will be available under in the output
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 作用: The field that your iCalendar file will be available under in the output | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: addBOM (值: None) - Whether to add special marker at the start of your text file. This marker helps some programs understand how to read the file correctly.
format (值: None) - Whether to format the JSON data for easier reading
encoding (值: None) - Choose the character set to use to encode the data
fileName (值: None) - Name of the output file

sourceProperty.name: sourceProperty
sourceProperty.description: The name of the input field that contains a string to convert to a file. Use dot-notation for deep fields (e.g. 'level1.level2.currentKey').
sourceProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input Field | 作用: The name of the input field that contains a string to convert to a file. Use dot-notation for deep fields (e.g. 'level1.level2.currentKey'). | (必填项)

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: once
available_options: All Items to One File (值: once)
Each Item to Separate File (值: each)

start.name: start
start.description: Date and time at which the event begins. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).
start.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start | 作用: Date and time at which the event begins. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.). | (必填项)

end.name: end
end.description: Date and time at which the event ends. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).
end.natural_language_description: 参数名: End | 作用: Date and time at which the event ends. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.). | 提示: If not set, will be equal to the start date | (必填项)

allDay.name: allDay
allDay.description: Whether the event lasts all day or not
allDay.natural_language_description: 参数名: All Day | 作用: Whether the event lasts all day or not | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attendeesUi (值: None)
busyStatus (值: None) - Used to specify busy status for Microsoft applications, like Outlook
calName (值: None) - Specifies the calendar (not event) name. Used by Apple iCal and Microsoft Outlook. More info.
description (值: None)
fileName (值: None) - The name of the file to be generated. Default name is event.ics.
geolocationUi (值: None)
location (值: None) - The intended venue
recurrenceRule (值: None) - A rule to define the repeat pattern of the event (RRULE). (Rule generator).
organizerUi (值: None)
sequence (值: None) - When sending an update for an event (with the same uid), defines the revision sequence number
status (值: None)
uid (值: None) - Universally unique ID for the event (will be auto-generated if not specified here). Should be globally unique.
url (值: None) - URL associated with event
useWorkflowTimezone (值: None) - Whether to use the workflow timezone set in node's settings rather than UTC
